name: PlatformerDotRage
description:
Play as a farmer in search of his turnips in one of the hardest platformers around. This game was created in my senior year of high school as a senior project. It obviously isn't award winning but it is an addicting, fun, and difficult rage puzzle platformer. Thanks for playing.

This game was created in GameMaker Studio PRO

Currently, you can reset the game by pressing the Esc key on your keyboard.
